main.name: Arturo Ortega
main.description: 24 y/o computer enthusiast, with a habit of self-teaching.
main.bio: My name is Arthur, I'm a Jr. Full-Stack developer that loves music, beauty, and poetry. I have an actual background on those three. I'm a fast learner, goal-oriented, and usually percieved as an "Out-of-the-box" thinker.
main.contactmessage: Email me your questions, proposals, requests and anything that you'd think it's meant to get to me.

education.description: Was doing quite well and even exeedingly good in many assignatures until I screwed it up big time.

work.title: SMS Agent and Data Analyst
work.description: Desk magician. Handling incoming SMS, filtering them out, and analyzing data quality and behaviour.

work.title: Back Office Agent
work.description: Re-Assigning orders that failed to be assigned manually for the GrubHub food delivery app.

projects.title: Particle Simulator (mobile)
projects.category: Simple particle simulator for mobile devices using p5js

projects.title: Fourier Series
projects.category: Visualizing fourier series for a square wave using p5js

projects.title: Multiple-option quiz
projects.category: Evaluation for a predetermined exam in JavaScript and HTML
